author: Deleted User
content: When is the Sepolia merge planned?

author: tmiychao
content: Target is Wednesday, July 6, 2PM UTC. Traditionally, bordel.wtf tracks it . And for now the hashrate is back to normal again!

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Note that while the above date is the target you might want to check the ETA on your actual nodes.
